document.heading: Fleet Traffic Adjudication Amendment Act of 1997

history.narrative: Law 12-76, the “Fleet Traffic Adjudication Amendment Act of 1997,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-297, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 4, 1997, and December 4, 1997, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 22, 1997, it was assigned Act No. 12-231 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-76 became effective on March 24, 1998.
